title: How the Principle of Gurutva Functions Universally | Sri Madhu Pandit Dasa | SB 3.22.8 | 06.08.2024
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.text: Translation in purport by S. D. V. Bhai Charanarvinda Bhaktivedanta Swamishila Prabhupada
O great sage, graciously be pleased to listen to the prayer of my humble self.
For my mind is troubled by affection from my daughter.
When a disciple is perfectly in consonance with the spiritual master
having received his message and executed it perfectly and sincerely
he has a right to ask a particular favour from the spiritual master.
Generally, a pure devotee of the Lord or a pure disciple of a bona fide spiritual master
does not ask any favour either from the Lord or the spiritual master.
But even if there is a need to ask a favour from the spiritual master
one cannot ask that favour without satisfying him fully.
Swayambhuva Manu wanted to disclose his mind regarding the function
he wanted to execute due to affection for his daughter.
